card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Beanstalk Giant // Fertile Footsteps
card.text:
Beanstalk Giant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
---
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Umara Wizard
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, Umara Wizard gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Umara Skyfalls
card.text: Umara Skyfalls enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Nezumi Graverobber
card.text: {1}{B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If no cards are in that graveyard, flip Nezumi Graverobber.

card.name: Nighteyes the Desecrator
card.text: {4}{B}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Fire // Ice
card.text:
Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
---
Tap target permanent. Draw a card.
